biotools.summary: EnzymeMiner identifies putative members of enzyme families or subfamilies and facilitates the selection of promising targets for experimental characterization. Two key selection criteria are (i) the predicted solubility and (ii) the sequence identities visualised using an interactive sequence similarity network. The search query can be a sequence from the Swiss-Prot database or a custom sequence with a custom description of essential residues. The output is an interactive selection table containing annotated identified sequences.
